website_summaries.verdict: A simple, but effective way to light up dark, hard to reach spaces inside closets and cabinets.
pros: 3 strips are highly customizable in terms of installation and placement
Separate them, or easily make the strip longer by adding an extension cord (sold separately)
The lights produce a bright, crisp light effect that brings life to any space they're in
The lights were compact enough that you can't see them, or the wires when installed under kitchen cabinets
LED Concepts lights provide just enough light in the kitchen to eliminate the need to always turn on your overhead lighting – an effective energy saver
cons: The screws included for installation are soft and can easily break if not handled with care

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This light is perfect for under the cabinet over my sink that was previously very dark except for a small night light, even with the overhead light, it was always dark over my sink. I'm attaching a couple of photos even though the photos didn't turn out that well, the light is super bright and makes everything look sparkly. It was easy to install and works great! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ShastaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Overall, we're very happy with these lights!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I didn't want to feel like I was looking into the sun, but I wanted a well-lit kitchen counter. These lights are appropriately bright. The daylight option gives a nice, natural looking "white light". They were also very easy to install. I would rather have a single switch near the light-end of the cord than the rolling switch awkwardly in the middle, but that's on me- it is obvious by the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Deets

customer_reviews.title: LED Light Bars (12" Inch 3PK, Warm White)
customer_reviews.text: Hope these last longer than my puck light experiment. They plugged in to the same connector 120Volt as my puck lights. They don't show it in the pictures but they have two u shaped clips held in by one screw that hold them in place. The light isn't as bright as expected but color temp is good (warm white). Not pretty but better price than puck lights and they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Virtual pilot

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purcahse!
customer_reviews.text: These lights work well and where easy to install. I have seen some negative reviews about the mounting hardware but I thought the hardware was very good and easy to work with. The lights themselves work well and I'd estimate that the warm white LEDs that I purchased are around 2700 kelvin in color and produce around 800 lumens. This is just an estimate based on my eye and not measured. I installed them under a cabinet above our washer and dryer replacing a two tube fluorescent light. It's not as bright as the fluorescent tubes but plenty sufficient for seeing into the washer and dryer area plus these LEDs use 95% less power!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: A bright idea..
customer_reviews.text: The product is simple and can be installed without too much trouble. My only issue was being able to see the screws for the fasteners under a counter. My existing under-counter light stopped working which is why I bought this product. But once installed it works very well. The three segments of lights connect easily together and are very bright. Giving that additional segments can be added to the "string" I will probably buy three more segments and attach them. It does such a nice job and it can't be seen under the lip of a group of cupboards.
customer_reviews.author: Malice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our kitchen! Love the small plug.
customer_reviews.text: I installed these in our kitchen underneath the overhead cabinets. They were easy to install and I particularly liked that the cord/plug is small (our outlets are mounted in a strip at the top-back of underside of overhead cabinets so any large plug wouldn't have fit. I wish the switch was a dimmable slider switch instead of a turny-non-dimmable-switch, but overall, I've been super happy with these. They provide great mostly-white light and really helps us light up the counter underneath the cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: PicklesMcGhee

customer_reviews.title: The hardware is sub par
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these lights to provide some light on the counter when I prep meals. They do just that. I can see what I'm working with but don't see the lights. They tuck up under the cabinets very nicely. The only reason I can't give a 5 is the hardware. The screws for mounting the clips are garbage. The heads stripped out right away. If I take these lights down or move them, I will have to drill out the screws. The lights themselves are just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly in our dark closets
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after I tried cordless LEDs that did not work well. These were perfect for where I used them. I used all three in a dark closet and now there is ample bright light. Since each light can plug into the next, I put two up above the door header. I extended the cord to the third light by using white lamp cord and spliced them together with wire nuts and then used white electrical tape over the splice area. Worked perfectly. Now I just flip the switch and poof - a well lit closet!
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a very good product. Easy to install and good white light. I installed these on a workbench of mine and it's perfect for that. These are a little more bulky than the ones I put in my kitchen (maybe 3/4" thick compared to maybe an 1/8" in my kitchen), but for the price it seems to be a great product as I spent considerably less on these. These are great for workbenches as the LEDs are embedded in a silicone like material so if one was to get them dirty they can be cleaned easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product. Gets warmer than expected, for led's. One of the mounting clips broke during installation. They should pack extras or make it stronger. Very easy installation otherwise, and no ugly wall plug adapter. They will now be on 24/7 until they let me down or I move, whichever comes first. Many years away, I hope.
customer_reviews.author: J P

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but not as warm white as I would like.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Warm White version and in general was happy with the construction and quality of the product - and the fact that it is plug-n-play with no need for a transformer is great. My biggest complaint is that the light quality is on the high end of "warm white." Warm White is considered from about 2700K to 3500K - and these are definitely on the cooler end of that spectrum. I was looking for something closer to 2700K and these - I'm guessing - are about 3000K -- and too cool for what I need (a wall sconce that I'm building), hence four stars instead of five.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great lights, wish they had an additional connector included.
customer_reviews.text: The LED's work perfectly! I dropped one star because I needed this on two cabinets (three strips are really way to bright for under one that is not really long) and I had to fabricate another cable end to fit (I actually just cut the connector off and spliced) onto more cable - both sets are controlled by an existing switch. Overall though, the strips appear to be manufactured very well and provide good light under the cabinets I have. Recommend this product highly for replacing old florescent or incandescent under cabinet lights!
customer_reviews.author: Ozark Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very bright light.
customer_reviews.text: There are two changes I would like to see if I bought it again. A flat plug would give it a cleaner look and relieve the pressure off the 90 degrees of the present plug, since this is going under cabinets over our sink in our Motorhome. I would prefer a rocker on/off switch rather than the roller switch. Other than that, it worked out wonderful as it is a very bright light.
customer_reviews.author: 🌼🌸Sissy🌹🌷

customer_reviews.title: I did wire them direct into my previously installed wall switch which worked great. Even though I had to use 5 of ...
customer_reviews.text: Received package in 2 days (Prime). Removed old undercabinet fluorescent lights and replaced with LED Concepts® Under Cabinet Linkable LED Lights. Installation was very simple. I did wire them direct into my previously installed wall switch which worked great. Even though I had to use 5 of these 12 inch strips to give the same amount of light that I previously had with 3 single tube 18 inch fluorescents I am very well pleased with these lights. I do have another set on order to replace another section of undercabinet lighting.
customer_reviews.author: AJC

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights!
customer_reviews.text: These lights arrived in perfect condition because they were packed securely. I first ordered a packet of 6 lights, then after those were installed and I could see how much light they gave, I ordered another 3 to fill in the dark spots. I have to say, they transformed my kitchen. I had just installed new white quartz counters, and the reflection off their surfaces amplified the LED lights even more. I did not install these myself; I hired a workman and it took him about 3 hours to install them to his and my satisfaction; the expensive part is probably the labor to install rather than the lights themselves. It is totally worth the money, though; I'm thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: una530

customer_reviews.title: This really does the job
customer_reviews.text: As usual it is difficult to install lights under a counter but these were easier than in the past. You do not have to line up the screws exactly, just approximately as the clips will grab at any angle that is close. It would be easier if there was an adhesive on the clips to hold them in place while you tried to set the small supplied screws. These lights worked great with my existing 3 phase dimmer switch and at all three light levels gave off off more than adequate light. A good product....would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Marshall

customer_reviews.title: A little hard to install
customer_reviews.text: These are VERY bright. Just what I needed for under my cabinets. My only complaint is that the installation is tedious. The two-sided tape isn't sufficient to hold up them very long and the mounting brackets are VERY small...I had a difficult time getting them installed. The light however is very good.
customer_reviews.author: juju2011

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy install plug and play. Brightens granite counter/sink under cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth H. Hirai

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough.....
customer_reviews.text: Have had these undercabinet lights installed for a year now. I keep them on 24/7. They are bright enough, but I wish they were a tad warmer, more amber in color. Other than that, no complaints thus far.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Love ,love, love
customer_reviews.text: I just installed these under my cabinets and I have to say it was one of the easiest things I ever did. If I am saying it's easy, then it's really easy other than struggling to get underneath the cabinet. The light is great, not as bright as some old florescence I have but very sufficient. I will still need to contact an electrician did not have to use the plug
customer_reviews.author: jmdallas

customer_reviews.title: Ok but too much cord
customer_reviews.text: I like these ok. They are pretty narrow and smaller than I thought. I do not like all the cord. I used double sided tape to install and it worked well. I didn't want to screw into my cabinets. I had to use a lot of duct tape to hold the cord up so it doesn't hang clear down. I ordered some lighting that I like better but it was twice the cost. These are fine and definitely serve the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great brightness, white.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great undercounted replacing old fluorescent. We went thru so many expensive bulbs that I am hoping these last. Some of the family think these are a bit whiter than the light from the old flourescents, but that is because the old plastic covers had yellowed. The point light does make a more distinct reflection in granite than the older diffused fluorescents, so I might put the old covers over these LEDs. They fit perfectly, the cords and connectors were all the right lengths. Will update later on reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Let's Move This Wall

customer_reviews.title: love the concept
customer_reviews.text: I love how bright these lights are the only reason I gave 4 stars is because the light switch is at the end of the cord close to the plug. In my install I needed it to be close to the lights. Service through Amazon was great. I hope this might help someone else with there project.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Naab

customer_reviews.title: Great little lights!
customer_reviews.text: These small lights make all the difference in my kitchen under the counter. My husband installed them quickly and easily. Very happy with the result!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome
customer_reviews.text: These led lights are awesome, what i love mostly about them besides being bright is the mounting system, most of these strip led lights have the double sided sticky tape that's not suitable for every applications. These come with brackets that are secured with screws and won't fall off like the ones with sticky tape. You won't regret buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lyew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect under my kitchen cabinets
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but slim enough to hide under cabinet easily. Light color is mellow but bright. Spacing between lights worked great. I bought a 3 light pack for a 38” cabinet and the 6 light set for the cabinet over my peninsula. Very pleased after looking at lots of lights.
customer_reviews.author: GBLady

customer_reviews.title: Mounted under the kitchen cabinets, and they work well ...
customer_reviews.text: Mounted under the kitchen cabinets, and they work well. The mounting brackets are little flimsy. they also give off just a touch more heat than I was expecting, so can slightly warm the items directly above them in the cabinet (i.e. might slightly accelerate aging of spicing or aspirin/etc if stored there). But in comparison to the more typical non-LED lights, these totally rock.
customer_reviews.author: CampPerryHighPower

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I put these over my tv console. I combined it with the plug in power outlet that is remote controlled. I liked it so much I bout some to place over my kitchen cabinets as well. The end result makes it looks like it was professionally installed, allows me to not have my lights on all the time, gives its enough lighting for evening tv watching, and thanks to the remote it is very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These lights worked out perfectly for the location I put ...
customer_reviews.text: These lights worked out perfectly for the location I put them. Under the cabinet over the coffee pot. I would actually prefer them a little dimmer in the morning but not going to get a dimmer switch and all that bull. I've gotten used to them and my installation went well and you cannot see them the way I installed them.
customer_reviews.author: Jay G.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I needed. I installed these under the cabinet above my stove. There was a shadow there because of the cabinets blocking the ceiling lights. The LED Concepts® Under Cabinet Linkable LED Light Bars are very bright. The easily light up the entire stove top, just not the back where it was installed. I will be purchasing more of these in the near future. Thanks for making an affordable quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works even in a beer sign
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great. I bought the set of three to replace old fluorescent lighs in a beer sign, and the brightness of three of these strips are comporable to two 16" fluorescent bulbs, but without the heat and wasted power.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Blow

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect, in fact I bought 2 sets for my under cabinet lighting in my kitchen- Not too white and not too yellow! I will say however that the installation with the micro mini screws left a bit to be desired- I know that people were wondering about getting longer connecting cords and I found 24" ones @ Menards for $2 bucks- Hope that helps everyone!
customer_reviews.author: AK WARREN

customer_reviews.title: Unresponsive
customer_reviews.text: 1 of 3 light bars did not work. Replacement was different color temp than others. Wrote twice asking for a new one that matched. No response.
customer_reviews.author: Cooperthecat

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Bright
customer_reviews.text: These lights are easy to install and put out great light using a small footprint. After looking at the big box stores and finding nothing that fit the bill with the price or functionality I found these through a friend and I am glad that I did. The linking pieces did not help me much between cabinets, but I just snipped the plugs off and spliced them together with some extra wire to operate off a single switch. No need to be an electrician, you can also splice them together and run off a single plug.
customer_reviews.author: Quaddzilla

customer_reviews.title: Great under cabinet lights
customer_reviews.text: Super slim lights are hidden from view and provide ample lighting while staying cool to the touch and saving energy. Great product for the price. Easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and lighting is nolonger an
customer_reviews.text: During our home remodel I opened up the area under my staircase for added storage space. The only thing was lighting construction install an electrical outlet and the LED solved the issue of the lights. Awesome product and lighting is nolonger an issue
customer_reviews.author: Irving Joe

customer_reviews.title: Really good lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great. Not cheap but made well and put out nice light. Look professional. Easy to install. Put them above and below our cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Dennisvj

customer_reviews.title: Great Space Saver!
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had one more cord to plug in, as all I needed was two out of the three, but I will be ordering another set to put under my kitchen cabinets. I did wish that the switch was further away from the plug in as I have to reach under my office desk to turn it on and off. But it's plugged in and eliminated my need for two other small lamps in a very limited space, so this is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Nolen

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights as we don't always have to turn on the bright ceiling lights. Helps keep the ambiance of the rest of the house when just needing a quick drink or food item instead of flooding the area with bright lights. They were extremely easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!  Your kitchen cabinets will look fantastic!  Put them under and on top of the cabinets!
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen is sooooo beautiful because of these! I put them under the cabinets, and used the short spacers to space the lighting out so that is looks like it was done professionally! Then I put some up on top of the cabinets! I always get compliments about these!
customer_reviews.author: Rich Allcorn

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying another set.
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. The only problem I had was with the screws -the head stripped on the first two I tried to install, but I have plenty of better screws in my collection. After the screw replacement, installation was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Tess Trueheart

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Waste of time, ordered white and they sent me warm white. In the picture they are next to a little white led, these look like yellow
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lights, Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. They're perfect for under the bookshelves, above our living room table. We liked them so much, my boyfriend got one for his house, and another set for his friend who put them in her study. That's the best testimonial I can give....if I like a product, I'll buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Have Mirthy

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace a fluorescent fixture in an indoor tortoise pen. No doubt the warm whites would look good in a kitchen but they weren't bright enough to suit me so I got another set of cool white. Loved that I was able to connect them to the existing lights & the results were what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: David Culwell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality lights
customer_reviews.text: Good quality lights. Nice and bright white color and plugs directly into A/C outlet. I like that they put an inline swithc for ON/Off function. Easy install and runs cool. Would recommend these for anyone wanting some nice under cabinet lighting for the price.
customer_reviews.author: joseph allen

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are outstanding, I highly recommend! I hardwired into my old wiring, added an led dimmer switch and they operate perfectly! I think the warm color is right on the mark just a slight amber when full bright, very warm lighting when set very dim.
customer_reviews.author: vivirus

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy and Very Bright !
customer_reviews.text: These little lights are bright and so easy to install. Took about 10 min tops ! Used in our pantry where there no lights at all. And now it's nice and bright. I will definitely get these again if I find somewhere needing a little extra help with lighting.
customer_reviews.author: DF732

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. I'm using the for around my vanity
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. I'm using the for around my vanity. These are very bright and look very clean and trim. Only reason I'm not giving five stars is the on switch is inconveniently placed. It should be hire up on the cord. At least for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Initial thoughts after install are great. Works with low priced slide dimmer we purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: Initial thoughts after install are great. Works with low priced slide dimmer we purchased from L owes. Mounted in the clips supplied included the measurements are just under 9/16" tall by just under 15/16" wide.The length of the 3 fixtures stretched tight are just under 46-1/4" in length. Time will tell, if I remember I will update as time moves on. Photos include no additional light, low dimmer light and full additional light.
customer_reviews.author: archer4890

customer_reviews.title: i wish it was more flexible.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn't like is that the cord in between the lights was short, so I can't really use three in a row in my small kitchen. So I've only used 2. But! It's very bright and works great under the cabinets I have.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Luz

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Was much brighter and easier to install than I could have hoped. I have it right above my stove and I was worried the heat would affect it. So far no issues. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M3

customer_reviews.title: Even lighting, bright enough for close work.
customer_reviews.text: I like. Fair amount of light. Pity they have to be used serially. My cabinets are not close enough to put three in line.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Easy to install. I used the bright white to place under a shelf over my desk and it provides the perfect amount of light for desk work.
customer_reviews.author: John in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: I rated low as now fastening clips
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice and bright - was shipped without connects - supplier corrected the issue so we are 100% good..
customer_reviews.author: S McD

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, bright, under cabinet LED light strips
customer_reviews.text: Great set of strip LEDs for under cabinet installation. Very bright and easy to install. Plugs directly into 120v receptacle, no transformer necessary. Has a on/off, in-line wheel switch. Has quick disconnect plug between each strip of lights.
customer_reviews.author: EGH923

customer_reviews.title: Like them alot!
customer_reviews.text: I used the lights for my vanity makeup mirror but I like them so much I will probably get more to go under my kitchen cabinets. The are not that blue white either , they are warm and very bright. Quick shipping also.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was searching for!!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for!. They are low profile and I was able to use only two lights for one application and the remaining light for another application. I liked them so much that I bought another set for another application. You can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny T

customer_reviews.title: Great low profile LED  lighting
customer_reviews.text: I used these to replace some 8 year old fluorescent lights that I couldn't get bulbs for. These were less expensive than the old style and even less than the bulbs would have been. They even snapped into the old brackets making the job less work. Great light output and cheaper to run. I liked them so much I was going to re-do all the under cabinet lighting in my kitchen with these until I found out the can't be dimmed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff the boater

customer_reviews.title: These are SUPER you don't have to have a transformer to make ...
customer_reviews.text: These are SUPER you don't have to have a transformer to make them work!!! They are real easy to install. I will buy more in the future
customer_reviews.author: Brad Whittle

customer_reviews.title: Brightness.
customer_reviews.text: Great for my craft room, it is very bright. Easy to install where ever you want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy to install
customer_reviews.text: Love these convenient light strips. I'm 87 year old woman living alone and had no problem installing them under my kitchen cupboard. I plan on getting more to use in display cupboards
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light...
customer_reviews.text: The wife was telling me that the area under the cabinets was too dark. This solved the problem. Very easy to install. Low profile.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: They do get warm.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace under cabinet lights. They give good light and are easy to install. However, they do get quite warm.
customer_reviews.author: SD Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: a good product at the right price
customer_reviews.text: Product is well described, and fits our need for lighting within a desk hutch. The only improvement suggestion for the product would be for the mounting clips to be a little more pliable. All in all, a good product at the right price. Service and delivery time was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: These lights work great on my display case!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my display case. They fit nicely at the top and the light reaches all the way to the bottom with a nice even light throughout. I'm very happy with these lights.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Took leas than 15 min to install.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, it gives good coverage to section of counter that I plan to use for serving food for Memorial day Bbq. Light is diffused well to the point that it isn't apparent where individual light bars are unless you look under lip of cabinet
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to mount and connect together to form a long ...
customer_reviews.text: These lights are of a quality construction. They are easy to mount and connect together to form a long string of lights. The connecting cords is long enough to jump the ledges between cabinet sections. I like them!
customer_reviews.author: L. Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Great Lighting
customer_reviews.text: I installed these lights in my wood working shop on the 27th of November to fill in an area that needed some extra light. They seem to be working great for now. The ability to attach other lights to the existing lights makes it much better to fill in other areas.
customer_reviews.author: John Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Did a great job lighting under my kitchen cabinets
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job lighting under my kitchen cabinets. Installation was very easy. The only thing I wish was different about these lights is if the connector cord was longer between the light strips.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: These are great under cabinet lights
customer_reviews.text: These are great under cabinet lights, just wish I could buy an extension to connect a remote cabinet to have the same exact lighting and all on the same switch.
customer_reviews.author: Darks

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Easy
customer_reviews.text: These are so easy to install! Wish they had extensions available but they're still great.
customer_reviews.author: Sister

customer_reviews.title: You may need extension cables  for some installs.
customer_reviews.text: These light strips work great . They are bright white light.and light the back splash and counter very well. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl V. Zeller

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product We bought this to install inside a closet, so we haedwired it w a dinner Works as planned! Will buy again for another enclosed area :)
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Gal in MIA

customer_reviews.title: Great little light
customer_reviews.text: Great little light. The mounting bracket are good too. The screws are worthless. Don't bother with them. Seriously. I think they're made out of ww1 rust.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect
customer_reviews.text: Product came well packaged. The lights are very bright. Easy to connect. My only concerns were I could not get access to a drill to use the brackets provided so use sticky foam tape. Brackets would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with my LED lights
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my LED lights. Before everything was dark at the time of cooking, now I can't cook with the lights off. I'm happy with the purchase. And I recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Sorto

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely best bang for your buck.! I've purchased a few of these light strips as of recent and this one surprised me to say the least. .Feeling iffy due to the low price I said what the heck. Very impressed ! This one is much brighter and durable compared to the other ones ( which btw were almost twice the price). Definitely a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product works great! I was able to use it for my vanity in my room. It lights up very bright and it's nice that it's separate bars with flexible wire between.
customer_reviews.author: JMMeadows

customer_reviews.title: The light bars themselves are okay, But only the ...
customer_reviews.text: The light bars themselves are okay, But only the 6 pack comes with connecting extension pieces, though nothing in the description mentions that. I spent about $40 needlessly buying extensions from another site.
customer_reviews.author: swifty63

customer_reviews.title: Good value for under counter
customer_reviews.text: Lights are bright enough but not same color as my last batch. Good value for the price and attach easy enough
customer_reviews.author: audrey

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and bright light strips with plastic clips that are easy to install, screws included. The rotary line cord switch is installed nearer to the electrical plug rather than the strip(s) which may or may not be ideal for your situation.
customer_reviews.author: SW Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! These click together very easily and are nice and bright. It's a very simple installation that we did in 5 minutes! We have a Corner cabinet that makes the counter extremely dark. This isn't a problem anymore. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwo33

customer_reviews.title: but it illuminates good at the laundry closet area
customer_reviews.text: Not as bright as mentioned for the bath vanity area, but it illuminates good at the laundry closet area. Btw, it does work with a 3 step dimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Juan P.

customer_reviews.title: it's a good thing...
customer_reviews.text: great product, not as bright as I thought, but looks goods and works well as under counter lighting. comes complete, just add elbow gease....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These lights work great over a desk!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these lights for use in our office. We have a work area with a shelf above the desk, and the overhead lighting was shadowed by the shelf. These lights are just what we needed to brighten the space. They were very easy to install, and the low profile fixture does not encroach on the space, nor does it shine directly into the eyes like the old conventional florescent under counter lights. Once we placed the order, the lights arrived quickly! Thank you for the prompt service.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper Adel Vu

customer_reviews.title: I installed these easily in LESS THAN 15 MIN
customer_reviews.text: I installed these easily in LESS THAN 15 MIN. they are almost unnoticeable under my kitchen cabinets until I turn on the switch- and then I have nice bright light!! I think I will definately buy more.
customer_reviews.author: birdy

customer_reviews.title: This is the best undercabinet light I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the best undercabinet light I have ever purchased. So bright! I have gotten a few over the years and none work this well. I wish I had found this years ago! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Juanita M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: put them inside my beer sign to replace flourescent. worked great
customer_reviews.author: david aune

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE AND LOTS OF LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: installed under kitchen cabinet. They are great, gives so much more light
customer_reviews.author: greeneyes

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: These were great the first ten times. Then they died. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These lights are exactly what I wanted! They are bright, sturdy, easy to install, and not visible from above. I hope they have smaller ones for my smaller cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Namjoon's wife

customer_reviews.title: Great for undercabinet/counter top lights
customer_reviews.text: Used these to replace stick up LED tape lights. Much easier to install because the LED tape is enclosed in the plastic strips. Also much easier because there are no transformers to deal with. Light is good and, so far, no individual LED failures.
customer_reviews.author: Hollis Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bright white cool light under the cabinets over our sink! Love them!! Easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: sgmon

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy, effective
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, easy to install, more that bright enough. Great and inexpensive purchase: see pictures:
customer_reviews.author: satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good lighting
customer_reviews.text: Installed under bar top, it is bright and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Ashtin mama

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright and easy to connect together.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Bright lights, easy to connect with a power cord and switch. It also came with mounting brackets, but I will be using hot glue for my project.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great lights, great price!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these lights!! They are nice and bright and can connect from a single source with any hard wiring. SO pleased with all the extra light on my work spaces!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Connections between lamps are too short to be useful. also no installation pieces included and no way ...
customer_reviews.text: Connections between lamps are too short to be useful. also no installation pieces included and no way to contact company. ended up using one and junking the rest. will NOT buy from this company again since they obviously don't appreciate my business.
customer_reviews.author: William M Vierling

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly like it should
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly like it should. Great under cabinet lighting. My only thing I didn't like is that all 3 bars have to be strung together to use them all and the connectors are only about 4 inches long (as pictured in its listing). You can purchase extension wires, but I just rewired them. Installation is otherwise simple and neat. Power consumption is almost non-existent, as with most LED products.
customer_reviews.author: George Overly

customer_reviews.title: Bright discreet lights for under cabinets
customer_reviews.text: Very discreet lighting option for a kitchen, kinda a pain to install however. Does put out decent light.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Ranes

product_meta.title: LED Concepts Under Cabinet & Closet Linkable LED Light Bars -ETL Listed Power Supply (12" Inch -3PK, White)
feature_bullets: 12" INCH UNDER CABINET LED LIGHT BAR (3PK,White) —Linkable light bars with an ultra-sleek design to brighten up your space – Perfect cabinet accessory for task and mood lighting in any room
SUPER BRIGHT LIGHT BARS — Incredible energy efficient lighting with 18 LED lights on each bar (no replacement bulbs or batteries ever) —Safely brightens dark kitchens and/or counter spaces
LINKABLE FEATURE— Install individually or link multiple light fixtures together for additional surface lighting — Link up to 75 light bars maximum
MODERN DESIGN —Boasts a plug-in, ultra-slim, cool-touch design —Complements all countertops and cabinetry in both traditional and contemporary living spaces

EASY INSTALLATION—Easily mounts under cabinets or shelves with connector cable and 5"power cord— Features On/Off slide switch on power cord for quick use — Mounting hardware is INCLUDED —Wattage: 2.2W Power Requirements: 120V/60Hz
